short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: List all open windows and sync cookies between them

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is a plugin that can synchronize cookies in multiple tabs. The function it implements is that you can synchronize the cookie values ​​of other pages on the current page without having to copy them one by one.
